Operation 'uploadSessionsDelete' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. The current description is too minimal and lacks clarity about what happens when the session is aborted. Added details about session termination, data cleanup, and the effect on partial uploads to help AI agents understand the operation's consequences and when to use it.

data.current_description: Abort Upload Session. Note that the base URL is upload.apideck.com instead of unify.apideck.com. For more information on uploads, refer to the [file upload guide](/guides/file-upload).
data.description_suggestion: Aborts an active upload session and cancels any pending file uploads. This operation terminates the session identified by the provided ID, preventing further chunk uploads. Any partially uploaded file data associated with this session will be discarded. Note that the base URL is upload.apideck.com instead of unify.apideck.com. For more information on uploads, refer to the [file upload guide](/guides/file-upload).
data.reasoning: The current description is too minimal and lacks clarity about what happens when the session is aborted. Added details about session termination, data cleanup, and the effect on partial uploads to help AI agents understand the operation's consequences and when to use it.

message: Operation 'uploadSessionsFinish' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Added clarity about the operation's purpose (finalizing the file), the prerequisite condition (all chunks uploaded), the side effect (session closure and file commitment), and the expected response to improve AI agent understanding of when and how to use this endpoint.

data.current_description: Finish Upload Session. Only call this endpoint after all File parts have been uploaded to [Upload part of File](#operation/uploadSessionsUpload). Note that the base URL is upload.apideck.com instead of unify.apideck.com. For more information on uploads, refer to the [file upload guide](/guides/file-upload).
data.description_suggestion: Completes an upload session and finalizes the file after all chunks have been uploaded. This operation must only be called after all file parts have been successfully uploaded via the upload parts endpoint. Upon completion, the file is committed to storage and the session is closed. Returns confirmation of the finalized file. Note that the base URL is upload.apideck.com instead of unify.apideck.com. For more information on uploads, refer to the [file upload guide](/guides/file-upload).
data.reasoning: Added clarity about the operation's purpose (finalizing the file), the prerequisite condition (all chunks uploaded), the side effect (session closure and file commitment), and the expected response to improve AI agent understanding of when and how to use this endpoint.
